org.lobobrowser.clientlet

Interface ClientletRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientletRequestImpl

    public interface ClientletRequest
    A URL request such as a HTTP, file or FTP request.
    Author:
    J. H. S.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAltPostData()
      Provides alternative POST data in case no ParameterInfo is provied.
      Header[] getExtraHeaders()
      Gets additional headers used in the request.
      String getMethod()
      Gets the request method.
      ParameterInfo getParameterInfo()
      Gets information about the request parameters.
      String getReferrer()
      Gets the referring URL.
      RequestType getRequestType()
      Gets the type of request.
      URL getRequestURL()
      Gets the request URL.
      UserAgent getUserAgent()
      Gets information about the user agent making the request.
      boolean isGetRequest()
      Convenience method.
      boolean isNewWindowRequest()
      Determines if the request was made in order to open a new browser window.
      boolean isPostRequest()
      Convenience method.

    • Method Detail

      • getMethod

        String getMethod()
        Gets the request method.
        Returns:
        GET, POST, etc.

      • getRequestURL

        URL getRequestURL()
        Gets the request URL.
        Returns:
        the request url

      • getUserAgent

        UserAgent getUserAgent()
        Gets information about the user agent making the request.
        Returns:
        the user agent

      • getReferrer

        String getReferrer()
        Gets the referring URL. It should be null if none or unknown.
        Returns:
        the referrer

      • getParameterInfo

        ParameterInfo getParameterInfo()
        Gets information about the request parameters.
        Returns:
        the parameter info

      • getExtraHeaders

        Header[] getExtraHeaders()
        Gets additional headers used in the request.
        Returns:
        the extra headers

      • isGetRequest

        boolean isGetRequest()
        Convenience method. Determines if the request method is GET.
        Returns:
        true, if is gets the request

      • isPostRequest

        boolean isPostRequest()
        Convenience method. Determines if the request method is POST.
        Returns:
        true, if is post request

      • isNewWindowRequest

        boolean isNewWindowRequest()
        Determines if the request was made in order to open a new browser window.
        Returns:
        true, if is new window request

      • getAltPostData

        String getAltPostData()
        Provides alternative POST data in case no ParameterInfo is provied.
        Returns:
        the alt post data

      • getRequestType

        RequestType getRequestType()
        Gets the type of request.
        Returns:
        the request type
